description:
"I built everything on a solid foundation." -Said every successful man ever.

This course is your foundation.

In this course we will share with you what we have learned from our life experiences, from failing over and over in the world of women until we became really good with women: We will teach you not only from our lives but also from our own readings, workshops, seminars, interviewing experts and putting ourselves to the task of understanding women and how men relate to them in the most positive way.

You will learn how to embrace rejection, how to become tougher at “taking it" from women, and change destructive energies from females into constructive empathic relationships. You will learn that by changing yourself and taking proactive action you will transform into a man that is every lady's dream. based on your self-assurance, confidence, understanding of your authority and your power as a man.

What students say about this course:

"This course has helped me so much to understand women. After I applied what I learned to real life OI never felt out of place anymore in front of a woman." – Stallon Silver

"Amazing Course. I love the fact that has so much practical advice. Before taking this course I wasn't confident at all about girls, but now I can approach any woman without feeling the fear of being rejected. " – Alex Feliciano

"I recommend this course to any man that want to improve his skills with the ladies. This course made me challenge my own identity and why I had believed that I was just simply “bad with ladies" and made me take action into talking to any girl and feel at ease with myself" - Hans Graubard

'As weird as it sounds I bought this course for my brother. I grew up with him and I love him dearly, and he is a very smart professional engineer but he's never been good with girls, In fact, he's 26 and he's had only one girlfriend on his life just for six months. I could see the struggle on him and after he started applying on his life what he learnt on this course, he finally found a girlfriend and he is a completely different person" - Lisa Cartwright
title: Mastering The World of Women: Better Dates & Relationships
